artist: Painter: After Jonathon Richardson Senior; Artist: Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: half length portrait turned left and looking at viewer; wearing cap, gown and cravat; in an oval
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: Vol IV P.119 / Richardson pinx.   T.Chambars sculp. / GEORGE VERTUE, ENGRAVER / AElat. L. Ann MDCCXXXVIII | on sheet in pencil: 2-547
portfolio: From Walpole's " Annecdotes of Painting in England" 1762-1771
title: George Vertue, Engraver
